ComicInfo.Summary:
After so much time suppressed deep within the Hulk’s mind, Titan has emerged.
And he’s looking for a fight. And as Bruce unravels the true source—the true identity—of Titan, he knows destruction is the only option.
So the Mind Palace must come down. But Bruce will need the help of some trusted friends to do it.
LEGACY #780
ComicInfo.Title: Hulk Planet Part Five
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alex Ross,Frank D'Armata,Marte Gracia,Peach MoMoKo,Ryan Ottley,Steve McNiven
